name: MIRTH
description:
Everyone has dreamed of living in the time of mages, monsters and magic! This time period may not be as good as you envisioned it though...

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move the Mage,

Mouse to aim and left mouse button to shoot!

Items:

  Mana Potion: You use a bit of Mana everytime you shoot. This will refill your Mana meter!

 HP Potion: Very simple, this will replenish your health!

 Mana Boost: This will allow you to hold more Mana.

 HP Boost: Will allow you to hold more health, so you can take on more enemies.

  Key: You will need 3 to escape each dungeon.

Enemies:

  Follower: He flies and follows you, will shoot when in range.

  Tile: Shoots you, but will not move.

  Boss: Follower but big! (also has health)
